features: Upper: Combination of synthetic leather and mesh
OrthoLite® X55™ footbed made with 5% recycled rubber content
Sole Unit: VECTIV technology designed to maximize energy on the trail
3D TPU plate underfoot for multi-directional stability and forward propulsion
Rocker midsole geometry engineered to create long-lasting forward propulsion
Surface Control™ rubber outsole optimized for the trail
4 mm lugs for a rugged grip across all types of terrain.
